name: Dark Style Textboxes
description: Makes pre and textarea elements white on black. Probably best put to use added to dark-styled sites, or things like those After Hours styles, and stuff.
additional_info:
2021-04-17: 
Updated colors to make it less harsh on the eyes. Background is now slightly lighter than pure black, and text is now slightly darker than pure white.
Now makes use of style settings feature that didn't exist way back when. You no longer need to uncomment code.

2006-09-11:
Made optional section apply more specifically to the elements it should be applying to. I hadn't really been trying to fix that until now, because... I don't exactly use that part myself.
Also forced to only apply to web pages and not browser chrome, considering it doesn't work anywhere near correctly on browser chrome anyway, and there are other better ways to mess with that.
